message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a fantastic deal on this product. Given its value, I believe a price of $14,000 is fair. What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in the product. However, I am only willing to pay up to $12,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I understand your position, but $12,000 is a bit too low for me.  How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. After considering your last offer, I would like to propose $12,500 as a compromise.
